body:
# Story
Long long ago, there were a lot of BBS systems. They are small and fast and good.
However, those systems grew up since so many time passed. Now they become fat and slow and ugly.
What a disaster!
But no worry about this! Here comes a new star!
Yes, It's QBBS.

# And then?
Ehhhhh, nothing more to say. It's just being developed. Be patient, dark time will be over.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: QBBS
